properties.entry: INSERT INTO FEED ( FEED_INDEX , FEED_TITLE , FEED_CNT , FEED_EVAL , FEED_PUBLIC_TYPE , FEED_PATH_NY , DISTANCE , START_LAT , START_LON , MEM_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_FEED_INDEX.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO GPX_FILES ( GPX_NO , FEED_INDEX , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_GPX_FILES.NEXTVAL , SEQ_FEED_INDEX.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT FEED_INDEX , FEED_DATE , FEED_TITLE , FEED_CNT , FEED_EVAL , FEED_PATH_NY , FEED_RPR_DATE , DISTANCE , START_LAT , START_LON , MEM_NICK FROM FEED JOIN MEMBER USING(ME M_ID) WHERE FEED_PUBLIC_TYPE ='전체' AND FEED_RPR_NY = 'N' AND FEED_DEL_NY = 'N' ORDER BY FEED_INDEX DESC

SELECT FEED_INDEX , FEED_DATE , FEED_TITLE , FEED_CNT , FEED_EVAL , DISTANCE , START_LAT , START_LON , MEM_ID , CHANGE_NAME , HIT FROM FEED LEFT JOIN UPLOAD ON(MEM_ID =UPL_ID) WHERE FEED_INDEX = ? AND FEED_RPR_NY = 'N' AND FEED_DEL_NY = 'N'

INSERT INTO FEED_COMMENTS ( FEED_CMN_NO , FEED_CMN_ID , FEED_CMN_CNT , FEED_CMN_DATE , FEED_INDEX ) VALUES ( SEQ_FEED_CMN_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ?
)
SELECT FEED_CMN_NO , FEED_CMN_ID , FEED_CMN_CNT , TO_CHAR(FEED_CMN_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') "FEED_CMN_DATE" FROM FEED_COMMENTS WHERE FEED_INDEX = ? ORDER BY FEED_CMN_NO DESC
UPDATE FEED SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE FEED_INDEX = ? AND FEED_RPR_NY = 'N'
